channel.title: Server registration
channel.description:
When I was registering my server it brought me to a page telling me to a page that told me
"you need to sign in with this ID on your server for verification": User:***** Pass:*****
Well I signed in to my server successfully then immediately signed out. I went back to the verification page and my browser didn't redirect. So my questions are: 1. did it go through? 2. was I supposed to be redirected? 3. how will it take to register? 4. how will I know when it's been registered?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Server registration
item.dc:creator: @xXThatOneSkaterKidXx xXThatOneSkaterKidXx
item.description:
@xXThatOneSkaterKidXx wrote:

When I was registering my server
it brought me to a page telling me to a page
that told me

“you need to sign in with this ID on your server for verification”:
User:*****
Pass:*****

Well I signed in to my server successfully then immediately signed out.
I went back to the verification page and my browser didn’t redirect.
So my questions are:

  1. did it go through?
  2. was I supposed to be redirected?
  3. how will it take to register?
  4. how will I know when it’s been registered?

Thanks in advance.
